    """Learn about the world's highest peak, located on the border between China and Nepal, and its geological, climatic, and cultural features. Discover howMountEverestwas named, measured, and explored by various expeditions and surveyors."""
    # FINAL_ANSWER
    return f"FINAL_ANSWER: Learn about the world's highest peak, located on the border between China and Nepal, and its geological, climatic, and cultural features. Discover howMountEverestwas named, measured, and explored by various expeditions and surveyors."'}
